fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Primordial Jade Cutter__ Best offensive option for C6, as long as ER requirements are met. Not recommended for non-C6 Xingqiu.

__R3+ Sacrificial Sword__ High Energy Recharge substat and a useful passive help ease reaching ER requirements, and allow for an easier offensive build. Recommended for non-C6 Xingqiu

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value: Mistsplitter Reforged, Favonius Sword, Amenoma Kageuchi, Sacrificial Sword

fields.value: <sands> Energy Recharge or ATK% |<goblet>  Hydro DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate

fields.value: Energy Recharge|CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate|ATK%
